author: dildick
body: GEM/ME0 cluster size is restricted to `maxClusterSize_` and max number of clusters to `maxClusters_`.  By default both parameters are set to 8 as specified in the GEM TDR and Muon Upgrade TDR.  Both GEM chambers (`GEMChamber`) and ME0 chambers (`ME0Layer`) are designed to send out max 8 clusters of 8 neighboring trigger pads. In case there are more than 8 clusters, the algorithm selects the first 8. The cluster selection procedure is expected to be optimized later.
title: Restrict GEM/ME0 cluster size and max N clusters
